quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
author: Anonymous

quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Anonymous

quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Anonymous

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
author: Anonymous

quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
author: Anonymous

quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: When you feel like quitting, remember why you started.
author: Anonymous

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Your attitude determines your direction.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: What are you afraid of losing when nothing in the world actually belongs to you.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Act as though it is impossible to fail.
author: Dorothea Brande

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
author: Michael John Bobak

quote: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
author: Wesley Snipes

quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
author: Estée Lauder

quote: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
author: Dan Reeves

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Stay away from those who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Don’t be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A little progress each day adds up to big results.
author: Satya Nani

quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
author: Lance Armstrong

quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Rise above the storm, and you will find the sunshine.
author: Mario Fernández

quote: If you want to fly, give up everything that weighs you down.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: Hustle until your haters ask if you're hiring.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: You can waste your life drawing lines. Or you can live your life crossing them.
author: Shonda Rhimes

quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
author: Peter Marshall

quote: Never regret a day in your life. Good days give happiness, bad days give experience.
author: Anonymous

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: The man on top of the mountain didn’t fall there.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Ambition is the first step to success. The second step is action.
author: Anonymous

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Anonymous

quote: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Do what you love and you’ll never work a day in your life.
author: Confucius

quote: Dare to live the life you have dreamed for yourself. Go forward and make your dreams come true.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Make your fear of losing your greatest motivation.
author: Anonymous

quote: Work like there is someone working twenty-four hours a day to take it away from you.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Success is not just about making money. It’s about making a difference.
author: Anonymous

quote: If your dreams don’t scare you, they are too small.
author: Richard Branson

quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
author: Colin R. Davis

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Stop chasing the money and start chasing the passion.
author: Tony Hsieh

quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Whenever you see a successful person, you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
author: Vaibhav Shah

quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
author: David Brinkley

quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction.
author: Barack Obama

quote: The only thing that stands between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.
author: Joel Brown

quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: There is no royal road to anything. One thing at a time, all things in succession.
author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
author: Truman Capote

quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
author: Bruce Feirstein

quote: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you'll be successful.
author: Eric Thomas

quote: Consistency is what transforms average into excellence.
author: Anonymous

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
author: Karen Lamb

quote: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
author: Anonymous

quote: Don't tell people your dreams. Show them.
author: Anonymous

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down; it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: You are the master of your destiny. You can influence, direct and control your own environment.
author: Napoleon Hill
